title: Senior Hardware Design Engineer, 1000 -2000 USD, Binh Duong
company_name: CÔNG TY TNHH ARBIN INSTRUMENTS VIỆT NAM
job_description:
Join the hardware design team to design the BESS, BMS, and battery testing machine.
Prepare test specifications, test plans, and test reports.
Responsible for the verification and validation of developed hardware.
Conduct testing, evaluation, and troubleshooting of PCBs (Printed Circuit Boards).
Collaborate with the software team to ensure hardware-software compatibility.
Write documentation for calculations and circuit design analysis.
requirements:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical/Electronics Engineering, Mechatronics, or a related field.
3+ years of experience in hardware design related to power electronics, BMS, or battery systems.
Experience with high-voltage and high-current circuit design.
Product design experience in power converters/AC-DC circuits.
Experience in magnetic design for low and high-frequency transformers and inductors.
Strong design knowledge of digital and analog circuit designs.
Knowledge of control loop design and stability analysis, with experience in developing control systems for power inverters/converters.
Knowledge of thermal management, magnetic component design, EMC, and safety requirements.
Ability to analyze analog and power electronic circuits using error budgets, performance analysis, sensitivity analysis, etc.
Knowledge of PCB design that meets compliance and manufacturing requirements.
Good knowledge of electronic circuit design with op-amps, ADCs, and similar components.
In-depth knowledge of electronic components such as MOSFETs, IGBTs, transformers, and large capacitors.
Proficient in circuit design software such as Altium Designer.
Experience with prototyping, validation, and troubleshooting of electronic circuits.
Familiarity with the use of multimeters, oscilloscopes, and power analyzers.
Proficiency in calculations and circuit design analysis is an advantage
